SELECT A.AUC_OBJ_DSC /* 경매대상구분 */ , A.AUC_PRG_SQ /* 경매진행순서 */ , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN C.FTSNM WHEN LENGTH(C.FTSNM ) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(C.FTSNM ,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(C.FTSNM ) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(C.FTSNM ,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(C.FTSNM ,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(C.FTSNM ) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(C.FTSNM ,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(C.FTSNM ,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(C.FTSNM ) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(C.FTSNM ,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(C.FTSNM ,5,1) END AS FTSNM /* 축산중도매인명 */ , SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 1, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 4, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 7, 9) AS SRA_INDV_AMNNO /* 축산개체관리번호(바코드, 귀표번호) */ , SUBSTR(B.BIRTH, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(B.BIRTH, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(B.BIRTH, 7, 2) AS BIRTH /* 생년월일 */ , B.INDV_SEX_C /* 개체성별코드 */ , RTRIM(B.KPN_NO) KPN_NO /* PKN번호 */ , B.SRA_INDV_PASG_QCN /* 계대 */ , B.MATIME /* 산차 */ , A.COW_SOG_WT /* 우출하중량 */ , A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM /* 최저낙찰한도금액 */ , A.SRA_SBID_AM /* 축산낙찰금액 */ , A.SEL_STS_DSC /* 판매상태구분코드 */ , A.OSLP_NO /* 원표번호(경매번호) */ , A.AUC_DT , TO_CHAR(A.LSCHG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') LSCHG_DTM , A.CHG_PGID , A.CHG_RMK_CNTN , A.TRMN_AMNNO , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN DECODE(A.SEL_STS_DSC,'22',E.SRA_MWMNNM) WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC != '22' THEN NULL ELSE SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1)|| TRIM(LPAD(' ', LENGTH(E.SRA_MWMNNM) -1, '*')) || SUBSTR(E.SRA_MWMNNM,LENGTH(E.SRA_MWMNNM),1) END AS SRA_MWMNNM /* 축산중도매인명 */ FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW_LOG A , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV B , TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS C , TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN E WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.OSLP_NO = #{oslp_no} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.LSCHG_DTM >= ( SELECT TO_CHAR(A.LSCHG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') LSCHG_DTM
FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW_LOG A WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.OSLP_NO = #{oslp_no} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.SEL_STS_DSC != '11' AND ROWNUM = '1' ) AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.DEL_YN = '0' /* 삭제건이 아닌건 */ AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = B.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = B.SRA_SRS_DSC AND A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = C.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = C.FARM_AMNNO AND A.NA_BZPLC = E.NA_BZPLC(+) AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = E.TRMN_AMNNO(+) ORDER BY A.LSCHG_DTM
